response.overview: This year, Danish comedy lovers will finally once again be treated to a sensual, satirical and thigh-slapping show when the always topical and outrageous entertainer Jan Gintberg takes the stage at Musikhuset with his brand new comedy show ‘MIRAKLET’.  Jan Gintberg says, from the top of the wooden throne he has entrenched himself in for the show, that he is completely ready for the hungry audience:  "I see my humorous work a bit like Mahatma Gandhi's. It doesn't have to be beautiful, but it has to be able to blow some air under the sarong! Yes, it might have been Troels Lund Poulsen who said it... but that doesn't make it any less miraculous."
response.title: Jan Gintberg: Miraklet
